page.title: 03THE BRAUNSTONE ESTATE
page.content: The Braunstone Estate consists of a large council estate just of the main A47 road to Hinckley Town. It was built just after the second world war in the early 1950's.The houses are mainly semi-detached with large gardens but without garages.The population is a mixture of senior citizens,young families with children and middle aged people whose children have grown up and left home. The houses have just been extensively renovated as they were beginning to become old and in need of repair. The estate has just been divided by a new ring road which is under construction.This has caused some strong feelings on the estate and various petitions have been presented to the council.
